# options

**Instance Property**

A set of configuration options that determine the accessory views the PDF panel should display.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var options: NSPDFPanel.Options { get set }
```

## Discussion

You specify a set of options by combining the appropriate constants defined in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPDFPanel/Options-swift.struct].

## Managing the Contents of a PDF Panel

- **accessoryController**: A view controller for the accessory view that the panel can present.
- **defaultFileName**: The initial value for the user-editable filename shown in the name field of the PDF panel.
